text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Which shaved ice should I get? ♪<n>Maybe pineapple since
it's summer?<n>Oh, but kiwi sounds good too...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm... They all look delicious! I<n>need to take a closer look
at the menu.<n>I'll be right back!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Right now, Smart Falcon and I are at<n>the academy's
summer camp, taking<n>a quick break between training<n>
sessions.

text_block_list.name: Dirt-Racing Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Sigh... What's the point of goingsomewhere for summer training camp,when all I see is dirt, dirt, and more dirt! Give me a change of scenery foronce!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Out of the blue, I hear a deep sigh. I<n>look back and see a
familiar-looking<n>runner kicking at the dirt around her.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I'm baaack! ☆ I think I'm gonna go<n>with the Happy
Hawaiian Blue flavor<n>this time! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In the middle of my observations,<n>Smart Falcon returns from
checking<n>out the menu, so we head to the<n>cashier to buy
our shaved ice.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Phew! Another great day oftraining! Nothing like a frozen treat toget you motivated!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Hm? What's going on over there?<n>Seems like there's a
huge crowd<n>gathering.
choice_data_list: Why don't we go take a look?
Why don't we go take a look?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Smart Falcon and I head toward the<n>crowd to see what's
going on. Once<n>we get there...

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text: What do I do? What do I do?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A group of trainers and their<n>Umamusume trainees surround
a lone<n>trainer. The young man appears to be<n>panicking,
unable to decide what to do<n>next.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: I wonder what happened here...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her guess is as good as mine, so I<n>decide to ask the
trainers there to<n>shed light on the situation.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
W-we've got an emergency on our<n>hands! Break time's
over, and my<n>trainee hasn't come back yet!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
She isn't responding to our attempts<n>to contact her, even
though the sun's<n>about to set. If she isn't back before<n>
dark, she may end up lost.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Oh no! We've got to hurry up and find<n>her! C'mon, let's get
moving!
choice_data_list: Right, we should help look for her.
Right, we should help look for her.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Correct. This isn't the time to be<n>panicking. Let's split into
multiple<n>search parties. Do you know where<n>she might've
gone?

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Thank you all so much! Uhhh, let's<n>see...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After determining the trainee's<n>potential locations, each
party goes<n>their own way to search. As we head<n>to our
assigned spot...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
We're at the far end of the beach. It<n>doesn't seem like
anybody's here...
choice_data_list: We can't rule this place out just yet.
We can't rule this place out just yet.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, maybe she went out for a walk<n>and ended up going
super far.<n>Sometimes that happens.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Well, now that we're here, we should<n>get started on our
search! I'll check<n>the areas that are farther out!<n>Y'know,
since running on sand is my<n>thing!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Eager to look for the lost<n>Umamusume, Smart Falcon
dashes off<n>into the distance before I can say<n>anything.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Pant... pant... pant...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
(Is she over here? Or is she that<n>way? Hrk... I ran so fast I
forgot to pay<n>attention to where I am...)

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
(But I agreed to help, so I have to do<n>whatever I can! Full
speed<n>ahead—max power! ☆ Let's gooo!)

text_block_list.name: Dirt-Racing Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Huh? Is that... Falco? Why is she<n>running here?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I walk for what feels like an eternity,<n>but I'm unable to find
Smart Falcon or<n>the missing Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
How's your search going?! I've<n>looked up and down the
beach, but I<n>couldn't find her!

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text: I see... Dang it! Where do we even<n>look next?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The clock continues ticking down as<n>our search hits a wall.
We need to find<n>her before sundown, no matter what.<n>Just
as we ponder what to do next...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: I'm baaaaack!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I've returned for your heart! ☆ No<n>matter how far away I go,
make sure<n>to catch me! ♪ 'Cause I'm the<n>number one
Umadol—Smart Falcon! ☆

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Given that her body's completely<n>covered in sand, I
assume that Smart<n>Falcon has been running a fair bit.<n>
Behind her, I spot the missing trainee.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Trainerrr! I thought I told you to call<n>me Falco! ☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Eheheh... Sorry for making you worry.<n>I was too caught up
in the moment,<n>y'know? I just had to go all out!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Apparently the missing trainee had<n>gotten lost after
wandering a bit too<n>far. It's thanks to Smart Falcon that<n>
she was able to find her way back.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Aw, I wanted to train some more after<n>changing, but it's
already dark...

text_block_list.name: Dirt-Racing Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Excuse me, Falco!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Huh? What's up? Wait, it's you!

text_block_list.name: Dirt-Racing Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, we were on flag duty together,<n>remember? We both
have an aptitude<n>for dirt racing... To tell you the truth, I<n>was
never happy about that... until<n>now.

text_block_list.name: Dirt-Racing Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
When I saw you running earlier, you<n>looked so happy! It's
like you were<n>glowing under the sun! It made me<n>think to
myself, "Hey, dirt racing might<n>not be half bad!"

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After sharing her words of gratitude<n>with Smart Falcon, the
thankful<n>Umamusume heads off with a dash.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Her eyes... They were sparkling.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
And she was looking straight at me...<n>Ehehe, I think I might
have another<n>fan!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Everyone gave everything for their<n>performances, and it
inspired all the<n>people watching!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Isn't that amazing? It makes me<n>want to light up the world
for other<n>people too!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I guess it doesn't matter how you do<n>things as long as give
it your all! This<n>calls for a celebration! To my second<n>fan
ever! ♪

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Time to show the world my lovely<n>smile! ♪ I'm Smart
Falcon, and I'm the<n>cutest Umadol around! ☆

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Once Smart Falcon sets her mind on<n>something, there's
nothing that can<n>stop her from racing toward that goal.<n>
She's got charisma and<n>determination in spades. To put it<n>
simply...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Wait, what?! You're supposed to call<n>me cute! I'm going to
pretend you<n>never said that. Now one more time<n>from the
top! Remember—cute, not<n>cool!
